00033 // XXX : Provide access to this.
00034 const int ShowUnused = 0;
00035 
00036 string EventNames[] = {
00037 #define VAR_EVENT(x,y) #x ,
00038 #include "get_info/PropEvents.h"
00039 #undef VAR_EVENT
00040 ""
00041 };
00042 
00043 // 0 - ignore, 1 - read, 2 - write
00044 int EventCategory[] = {
00045 #define NULL_EVENT 0
00046 #define READ_EVENT 1
00047 #define WRITE_EVENT 2
00048 #define VAR_EVENT(x,y) y ,
00049 #include "get_info/PropEvents.h"
00050 #undef VAR_EVENT
00051 0
00052 };
00053 
00054 string VarNames[] =
00055 { "Bool" , "Bound", "SparseBound", "Range", "BigRange"};
00056 
00057 string ConEventNames[] =  {
00058 "StaticTrigger",
00059 "DynamicTrigger",
00060 "SpecialTrigger",
00061 "DynamicMovePtr",
00062 "AddSpecialToQueue",
00063 "AddConToQueue",
00064 "AddDynToQueue",
00065   "SearchTrie",
00066   "LoopSearchTrie",
00067 };
00068 
00069 string PropEventNames[] = {
00070 #define PROP_EVENT(x) #x ,
00071 #include "get_info/PropEvents.h"
00072 #undef PROP_EVENT
00073  };
00074 
00075  
00076  
00077 // This is put in an object so we can zero it at start time.
00078 struct VarInfo
00079 {
00080   long long int counters[VarTypeCount][VarEventCount];
00081   long long int concount[ConEventCount];
00082   long long int propcount[PropEventCount];
00083   VarInfo()
00084   {
00085    for(int i = 0; i < VarTypeCount; ++i)
00086      for(int j = 0; j < VarEventCount; ++j)
00087        counters[i][j] = 0;
00088        
00089        
00090    for(int i = 0; i < ConEventCount; ++i)
00091      concount[i] = 0;
00092      
00093    for(int i = 0; i < PropEventCount; ++i)
00094      propcount[i] = 0;
00095   }
00096 };
00097 
00098 VarInfo var_info;
00099 
00100 string pad(string s, int length = 18)
00101 {
00102   s.resize(length,' ');
00103   return s;
00104 }
00105 
00106 // There must be a neater way of doing this...
00107 string pad_start(string s, int length = 12)
00108 {
00109   string output;
00110   output.resize(length - s.size(), ' ');
00111   return output + s;
00112 }
00113 
00114 void VarInfoAddone(Info_VarType type, Info_VarEvent event)
00115 { var_info.counters[type][event]++; }
00116 
00117 void ConInfoAddone(Info_ConEvent type)
00118 { var_info.concount[type]++; }
00119 
00120 void PropInfoAddone(Info_PropEvent type)
00121 { var_info.propcount[type]++; }
00122 
00123 void print_search_info()
00124 {
00125    cout << pad("");
00126    for(int i = 0; i < VarTypeCount; ++i)
00127      cout << pad_start(VarNames[i]);
00128    cout << pad_start("Total");
00129    cout << endl;
00130   
00131    for(int j = 0; j < VarEventCount; ++j)  
00132    {
00133      long long int total = 0;
00134      for(int i = 0; i < VarTypeCount; ++i)
00135        total += var_info.counters[i][j];
00136        
00137      if(ShowUnused || total != 0)
00138      {
00139        cout << pad(EventNames[j]);
00140        for(int i = 0; i < VarTypeCount; ++i)
00141        {
00142          cout << setiosflags(ios::right) << setw(12) <<
00143                  var_info.counters[i][j];
00144        }
00145        cout << setiosflags(ios::right) << setw(12) << total;
00146        cout << endl;
00147      }
00148    }
00149    
00150    for(int check_type = 1; check_type < 3; check_type++)
00151    {
00152      long long int total = 0;
00153      for(int i = 0; i < VarTypeCount; ++i)
00154        for(int j = 0; j < VarEventCount; ++j)
00155        {
00156          if (EventCategory[j] == check_type)
00157           total += var_info.counters[i][j];
00158        }
00159         
00160      if(ShowUnused || total != 0)
00161      {
00162        if(check_type == 1)
00163          cout << pad("TotalChecks");
00164        else
00165          cout << pad("TotalChanges");
00166      
00167        for(int i = 0; i < VarTypeCount; ++i)
00168        {
00169          long long int checks = 0;
00170          for(int j = 0; j < VarEventCount; ++j)  
00171          {
00172            if (EventCategory[j] == check_type)
00173              checks += var_info.counters[i][j];
00174          }
00175          cout << setiosflags(ios::right) << setw(12) <<
00176                  checks;
00177        }
00178         cout << setiosflags(ios::right) << setw(12) <<
00179                 total;
00180        cout << endl;
00181      }
00182    }
00183   
00184   cout << "  ** Constraints" << endl;
00185   for(int i = 0; i < PropEventCount; ++i)
00186   {
00187     if(ShowUnused || var_info.propcount[i] != 0)
00188       cout << pad(PropEventNames[i]) << 
00189               setiosflags(ios::right) << setw(12) <<
00190               var_info.propcount[i] << endl;
00191   }
00192   
00193   cout << "  ** Queue Events" << endl;
00194   for(int i = 0; i < ConEventCount; ++i)
00195   {
00196     if(ShowUnused || var_info.concount[i] != 0)
00197       cout << pad(ConEventNames[i]) << 
00198               setiosflags(ios::right) << setw(12) <<
00199               var_info.concount[i] << endl;
00200   }
00201 }
